verses.verse: Then came <S%H7126><s%> the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad, <S%H6765><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hepher, <S%H2660><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Machir, <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh, <S%H4519><s%> of the families <S%H4940><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph: <S%H3130><s%> and these <S%H428><s%> are the names <S%H8034><s%> of his daughters; <S%H1323><s%> Mahlah, <S%H4244><s%> Noah, <S%H5270><s%> and Hoglah, <S%H2295><s%> and Milcah, <S%H4435><s%> and Tirzah. <S%H8656><s%>

And they stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> by the door <S%H6607><s%> of the tabernacle <S%H168><s%> of the congregation, <S%H4150><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Our father <S%H1><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> in the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> and he was not in the company <S%H5712><s%> of them that gathered <S%H3259><s%> themselves together against <S%H5921><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in the company <S%H5712><s%> of Korah; <S%H7141><s%> but died <S%H4191><s%> in his own sin, <S%H2399><s%> and had <S%H1961><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> sons. <S%H1121><s%>

Why <S%H4100><s%> should the name <S%H8034><s%> of our father <S%H1><s%> be done <S%H1639><s%> away <S%H1639><s%> from among <S%H8432><s%> his family, <S%H4940><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> he has no <S%H369><s%> son? <S%H1121><s%> Give <S%H5414><s%> to us therefore a possession <S%H272><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the brothers <S%H251><s%> of our father. <S%H1><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> brought <S%H7126><s%> their cause <S%H4941><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

The daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Zelophehad <S%H6765><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> right: <S%H3651><s%> you shall surely give <S%H5414><s%> them a possession <S%H272><s%> of an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> their father's <S%H1><s%> brothers; <S%H251><s%> and you shall cause the inheritance <S%H5159><s%> of their father <S%H1><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> to them.

And you shall speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> If <S%H3588><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> die, <S%H4191><s%> and have no <S%H369><s%> son, <S%H1121><s%> then you shall cause his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to pass <S%H5674><s%> to his daughter. <S%H1323><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> he have no <S%H369><s%> daughter, <S%H1323><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his brothers. <S%H251><s%>
And if <S%H518><s%> he have no <S%H369><s%> brothers, <S%H251><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his father's <S%H1><s%> brothers. <S%H251><s%>

And if <S%H518><s%> his father <S%H1><s%> have no <S%H369><s%> brothers, <S%H251><s%> then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to his kinsman <S%H7607><s%> that is next <S%H7138><s%> to him of his family, <S%H4940><s%> and he shall possess <S%H3423><s%> it: and it shall be to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> a statute <S%H2708><s%> of judgment, <S%H4941><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Get <S%H5927><s%> you up into <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> mount <S%H2022><s%> Abarim, <S%H5682><s%> and see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have given <S%H5414><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
And when you have seen <S%H7200><s%> it, you also <S%H1571><s%> shall be gathered <S%H622><s%> to your people, <S%H5971><s%> as Aaron <S%H175><s%> your brother <S%H251><s%> was gathered. <S%H622><s%>

For you rebelled <S%H4784><s%> against my commandment <S%H6310><s%> in the desert <S%H4057><s%> of Zin, <S%H6790><s%> in the strife <S%H4808><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> to sanctify <S%H6942><s%> me at the water <S%H4325><s%> before their eyes: <S%H5869><s%> that is the water <S%H4325><s%> of Meribah <S%H4809><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Zin. <S%H6790><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Let the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of the spirits <S%H7307><s%> of all <S%H3605><s%> flesh, <S%H1320><s%> set <S%H6485><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the congregation, <S%H5712><s%>

Which <S%H834><s%> may go <S%H3318><s%> out before <S%H6440><s%> them, and which <S%H834><s%> may go <S%H935><s%> in before <S%H6440><s%> them, and which <S%H834><s%> may lead <S%H3318><s%> them out, and which <S%H834><s%> may bring <S%H935><s%> them in; that the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> be not as sheep <S%H6629><s%> which <S%H834><s%> have no <S%H369><s%> shepherd. <S%H7462><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> you Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> a man <S%H376><s%> in whom <S%H834><s%> is the spirit, <S%H7307><s%> and lay <S%H5564><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%> on him;

And set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation; <S%H5712><s%> and give him a charge <S%H6680><s%> in their sight. <S%H5869><s%>

And you shall put <S%H5414><s%> some of your honor <S%H1935><s%> on him, that all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> may be obedient. <S%H8085><s%>

And he shall stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> who shall ask <S%H7592><s%> counsel for him after the judgment <S%H4941><s%> of Urim <S%H224><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> at <S%H5921><s%> his word <S%H6310><s%> shall they go <S%H3318><s%> out, and at <S%H5921><s%> his word <S%H6310><s%> they shall come <S%H935><s%> in, both he, and all <S%H3605><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> with him, even all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation. <S%H5712><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> him: and he took <S%H3947><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and set <S%H5975><s%> him before <S%H6440><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the congregation: <S%H5712><s%>
And he laid <S%H5564><s%> his hands <S%H3027><s%> on him, and gave him a charge, <S%H6680><s%> as the LORD <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H1696><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
